api hondatama dannawa janadhipathithuma thaniyama thirana ganne na.
nisi waidya prathikara nolabunu ewani mawuwaru daruwath samangama, ho athamwita thaman pamanak ho siya diwi hanikaragath awastha kothekuth thibenawa.

ma nelum kulunata wiruddha wa katha karanawa no weyi.

pasuwa don juwan kumaru pruthugisingen palagos nawatha budu dahama waladagena senawak samagagos palamuwana raja sinha raju (sithawaka rajasinha raju)parada udarata rajadhaniya allagena palamuwana wimaladharmasuriya namn rajawiya.meyin dadi kopayatapath pruthuhisin karaliyadde bandara rajuge puth don pilp pramukha senawak ragena udarata aakramanaya kalaha.mema aakramanayata sarthakawa muhunaduk wimaladharmasuriya raju aakramanikayan parada don pilp rajuda mara damiya.thamanta saduwu antha parajaya hamuwe kopayata path pruthuhisin ewaka rajakiya le uruma sahitha ekama thanaththiyawu dona katharina bisawa udarata rajina lesa namkaleya.mahajanayada rajakiya urumaya anuwa rajyathwayata pathwiya yuththe dona katharina hewath kusumasana dewiya bawa piligathha.meyin pasubata nowu wimaladharmasuriya raju aakramanaya kara kusumasana dewiya jiwagrahayen allagena aැyawa wiwaha karaganimen thama rajakiya urumaya janathawata thahawuru kaleya.

nawampoda perawaru 6.30 uposatha shila samadanaya sambuddha pujawa saha keti anushasanawa meheyawima :– siri gunasekara dharmayathanadhipathi lenabatuwe miththaloka nahimi, perawaru - 8.00 – dharma deshanaya diwurumwela winitha himi , 9.00 - wesesa desuma :- darshanapathi kathikacharya aananda silwa mahatha, 10.15– dharma deshanaya - shri්ra bodhi piriwen wiharawasi kohuliyadde dewananda himi, dawal sambuddha pujawa :- meheyawima rammale ariyawisuddhi himi, paswaru :- 12.45 –pirith sajjhayanaya saha theruwan wandanawa dharmayathanawasi himiwarun samaga sil pirisa, 1.15 – wishesha gihi deshanaya, meheyawima -shen blok mahatha, 2.30 – pansiya panas jathaka poth wahanse kiyawima, meheyawima :- wijesiriwardhana mahatha, 3.15 – wishakha kulangana samithiye wishesha niwedana ha punyanumodana idiripath kirima, 4.00 – dharma deshanaya rammale ariyawisuddhi himi, 7.00 – wishesha gilanpasa mal pahan pujawa saha buddha wandanawa meheyawima, dharmayathanadhipathi nahimi pradhana dharmayathanawasi maha sangharathnaya.
